entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
